data.lyric:
[ti:Alone]
[ar:Halsey/Big Sean/Stefflon Don]
[al:Alone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Alone - Halsey/Big Sean/Stefflon Don
[00:03.67]Lyrics by：Halsey/Eric Frederic/Daniel Dodd Wilson
[00:07.34]Composed by：Josh Carter/Ashley Frangipane/Eric Frederic/Dan Wilson/Tony Hester
[00:11.01]Halsey：
[00:11.42]
[00:14.41]Said he tried to phone me but I never have time
[00:18.67]He said that I never listen but I don't even try
[00:23.39]I got a new place in Cali but I'm gone every night
[00:27.83]
[00:28.49]So I fill it with strangers so they keep on the lights
[00:33.27]She said she told you she knows me but the face isn't right
[00:37.72]She asked if I recognized her and I told her I might
[00:42.19]
[00:43.49]See everywhere I go
[00:44.71]I got a million different people tryna kick it
[00:47.22]But I'm still alone in my mind yeah
[00:51.17]I know you're dying to meet me
[00:54.78]
[00:55.82]But I can just tell you this
[00:57.84]
[01:00.73]Baby as soon as you meet me
[01:03.91]
[01:05.42]You'll wish that you never did
[01:07.17]
[01:07.75]You'll wish that you never did
[01:10.17]Big Sean：
[01:10.96]Unh look
[01:12.28]
[01:13.11]I'm a real rare individual
[01:14.20]
[01:14.94]I'm in the physical and the metaphysical yeah
[01:17.48]I know you need your alone time that's critical
[01:19.73]But I need some of your time is that hypocritical
[01:21.97]D**n you know I relate to you more than fam
[01:24.91]So I won't sit around and let you sink in quicksand
[01:27.35]Look I know you got million dollar plans
[01:29.08]And you tryna build a brand live a life in high demand
[01:31.28]
[01:31.79]Swerving big b's your bag got little G's
[01:33.77]Gucci down to the socks like Biggie and Little Ceas'
[01:36.26]Let's hit the Maldives and hide behind palm trees
[01:38.73]Little red wine weed and a calm breeze
[01:40.82]
[01:41.42]'Cause baby you been living life inside a bubble
[01:43.27]
[01:43.83]When the last time you had somebody hug you
[01:45.99]Hold up when the last time you had somebody love you
[01:48.31]Hold up when the last time you love someone who love you
[01:50.54]Halsey/Big Sean：
[01:50.91]You know that everywhere I go
[01:51.96]I got a million different people tryna kick it for real
[01:54.65]But I'm still alone in my mind
[01:57.10]
[01:57.62]Halsey：
[01:58.22]I know you're dying to meet me
[02:01.97]
[02:03.09]But I can just tell you this
[02:05.07]
[02:07.99]Baby as soon as you meet me
[02:11.14]
[02:12.66]You'll wish that you never did
[02:14.91]You'll wish that you never did
[02:17.18]Stefflon Don：
[02:17.64]
[02:18.55]Stay up ina me all night ana rock
[02:20.17]
[02:20.91]U know seh mi have di wickedest tock
[02:22.62]
[02:23.40]Yuh all ways tell me seh mi full ah attitude
[02:25.13]
[02:25.81]An yuh nuh like mi friend cah she rude
[02:27.57]
[02:28.47]Still I pull up in the Benz wid tha all gold ting
[02:31.38]Window down cah u haffi see me with ma king
[02:33.85]What ya' sipping boy I'm dipping now ya' tripping of a fling
[02:36.00]
[02:36.69]I be clipping off ya wings tadah
[02:38.53]Halsey：
[02:38.82]See everywhere I go
[02:39.89]I got a million different people tryna hit it
[02:42.37]But I'm still alone in my mind
[02:45.76]
[02:46.52]I know you're dying to meet me
[02:50.02]
[02:51.08]But I can just tell you this
[02:53.02]
[02:55.96]Baby as soon as you meet me
[02:59.13]
[03:00.70]You'll wish that you never did
[03:02.49]
[03:03.02]You'll wish that you never did
[03:05.55]Yeah yeah
[03:06.92]
[03:08.28]I know you wanna I I know you wanna
[03:11.02]You'll wish that you never did oh
[03:14.13]I I know you wanna slip under my armor
[03:16.15]
[03:17.36]I know you wanna I I know you wanna
[03:20.71]You'll wish that you never did
data.trans:
[ti:Alone]
[ar:Halsey/Big Sean/Stefflon Don]
[al:Alone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.67]//
[00:07.34]//
[00:11.01]//
[00:11.42]
[00:14.41]他拼命打电话给我 但是我根本不予理会
[00:18.67]他说 我从不倾听 甚至都不会去尝试
[00:23.39]我在卡里找到了新鲜的去处 我可以每晚都去寻欢作乐
[00:27.83]
[00:28.49]我与陌生人交际 他们会帮我赶走孤寂
[00:33.27]她说 她告诉过你 她知道我的名字 却搞不清我是谁
[00:37.72]她问我 我是否认出了她 我告诉她 或许是吧
[00:42.19]
[00:43.49]无论我去哪里
[00:44.71]总有无数人想要引起我的注意
[00:47.22]但是我的内心依旧空虚
[00:51.17]我知道你渴望见到我
[00:54.78]
[00:55.82]但是我只能告诉你这些话
[00:57.84]
[01:00.73]宝贝 当你见到我的那一刻
[01:03.91]
[01:05.42]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[01:07.17]
[01:07.75]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[01:10.17]//
[01:10.96]看
[01:12.28]
[01:13.11]我是多么难得
[01:14.20]
[01:14.94]唯心主义唯物主义我都信
[01:17.48]我知道你要独处 这很重要
[01:19.73]但我需要占用一点你的时间 很虚伪吧
[01:21.97]该死的 我对你并不是玩弄而已
[01:24.91]我不光坐着 眼睁睁看着你被洪流淹没
[01:27.35]我知道你有发财大计
[01:29.08]你想要一个全新的高端生活
[01:31.28]
[01:31.79]你的包上面印着小小的G
[01:33.77]连袜子都是GUCCI Biggie Little Ceas'的
[01:36.26]去马尔代夫的海边 在棕榈树下乘凉
[01:38.73]品着红酒 吹着微微凉风
[01:40.82]
[01:41.42]宝贝 你一直生活在梦幻般的彩色泡泡里
[01:43.27]
[01:43.83]最后一次别人拥抱你时
[01:45.99]最后一次被爱时 一定要坚持
[01:48.31]最后一次彼此相爱时 一定要坚持
[01:50.54]//
[01:50.91]无论我去哪里
[01:51.96]总有无数人想要引起我的注意
[01:54.65]但是我的内心依旧空虚
[01:57.10]
[01:57.62]//
[01:58.22]我知道你渴望见到我
[02:01.97]
[02:03.09]但是我只能告诉你这些话
[02:05.07]
[02:07.99]宝贝 当你见到我的那一刻
[02:11.14]
[02:12.66]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[02:14.91]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[02:17.18]//
[02:17.64]
[02:18.55]和我一起 嗨一整夜
[02:20.17]
[02:20.91]你知道我的样子有多难看
[02:22.62]
[02:23.40]这就是我的生活态度
[02:25.13]
[02:25.81]跟我一个朋友一样 她很狂野
[02:27.57]
[02:28.47]但我还是坐在我的奔驰车里 欣赏我的黄金
[02:31.38]摇下窗户 看见我和我的老大
[02:33.85]你在吃什么 我在蘸料 我们一拍即合
[02:36.00]
[02:36.69]我在弱化你的翅膀
[02:38.53]//
[02:38.82]无论我去哪里
[02:39.89]总会有无数的人与我共聚
[02:42.37]但我内心的孤独仍然挥之不去
[02:45.76]
[02:46.52]我知道你渴望见到我
[02:50.02]
[02:51.08]但是我只能告诉你这些话
[02:53.02]
[02:55.96]宝贝 当你见到我的那一刻
[02:59.13]
[03:00.70]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[03:02.49]
[03:03.02]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[03:05.55]//
[03:06.92]
[03:08.28]我知道你想要 我知道你想要
[03:11.02]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
[03:14.13]我知道你想要 窥伺我铠甲之下的模样
[03:16.15]
[03:17.36]我知道你想要 我知道你想要
[03:20.71]你会希望 你从未与我相遇
